Indicator component assessed: F1a Number of properties in areas at different levels of risk of flooding from rivers and the sea, and from surface water
F1b Number of properties in areas at risk of flooding by source each year in England
F2a Number of properties registered for free flood warnings in England
F2b Percentage of flood or coastal risk management assets, in high consequence systems, in required condition in England
F3 Supply Demand Balance Index (SDBI) status by water company
